column3: News;Kampong Speu:------ A youth slipped on rocks and became trapped in a crevice at 12:40 pm on  30th October 2018. After being in the hole for a few hours
column4: he was rescued the same afternoon without injury.------The scene occurred in Anlong Por village
column8: and the boy who fell short of the stone was named 17-year-old Sok Lay.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/383073
